name: uwreact
description: Web app for team and project management
author: UW REACT <director@uwreact.com>

scripts.build:development: concurrently "cd merry && yarn build:development" "cd pippin && yarn build:development"
scripts.build:staging: concurrently "cd merry && yarn build:staging" "cd pippin && yarn build:staging"
scripts.build:production: concurrently "cd merry && yarn build:production" "cd pippin && yarn build:production"
scripts.deploy:development: yarn build:development && firebase use shire-development && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn build:staging && firebase use shire-staging && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:production: yarn build:production && firebase use shire-production && firebase deploy
